incidents.name: Conversations Temporary Sync Issues in Ie1

incident_updates.body: Twilio Conversations in ie1 was degraded between 01:21:00 and 01:31:30 UTC, on 01/20/2025 in ie1. During this period of time, customers may have experienced delayed/missed real-time updates. This issue has been resolved.

incidents.name: Conversations Temporary Sync Issues in ie1

incident_updates.body: Twilio Conversations in ie1 was degraded for 7 minutes between 21:28:30 and 21:36:30 UTC, on 01/20/2025. During this period of time customers may have experienced delayed/missed real-time updates. The issue has now been resolved.
Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with Converstations. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.

incidents.name: Customers Unexpectedly Redirected to Twilio Login Page

incident_updates.body: Our Engineering team has determined that this issue does not have a major impact for customers and will be continuing to investigate and remediate the full root cause. If customers experience errors, we recommend that they try to clear cookies and retry to log in.

We are still investigating a service interruption where customers may experience being unexpectedly redirected to the Twilio Console login page. This experience may impact new user signups as well as existing customers with established sessions within the Twilio Console. We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still investigating a service interruption where customers may experience being unexpectedly redirected to the Twilio Console login page. This experience may impact new user signups as well as existing customers with established sessions within the Twilio Console. We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still investigating a service interruption where customers may experience being unexpectedly redirected to the Twilio Console login page. This experience may impact new user signups as well as existing customers with established sessions within the Twilio Console. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still investigating a service interruption where customers may experience being unexpectedly redirected to the Twilio Console login page. This experience may impact new user signups as well as existing customers with established sessions within the Twilio Console. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating a service interruption where customers may experience being unexpectedly redirected to the Twilio Console login page. This experience may impact new user signups as well as existing customers with established sessions within the Twilio Console. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected potential Failures in Twilio sessions creation. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Orange Network in Congo

incident_updates.body: Twilio SMS was degraded for 290 minutes between 02:50 PST and 07:40 Pacific Time on 01/17/2025. During this period of time, customers may have experienced SMS delivery delays to the Orange network in Congo. The issue has now been resolved.

Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue causing SMS delivery delays to the Orange network in Congo. We will provide an update with customer impact details within the next two hours.
